name: House of Current
description: House of Current is a full-service, woman-run retail and fashion branding agency that specializes in giving style to smart ideas. Whether it’s B2B, B2C or WTF OMG, no campaign is too big, no detail too small. We’re located in Inman Park on mile marker 9.25 of the Atlanta Beltline, so come on over and let's talk about dogs and design on the porch.
